<div id="whats_new" class="registered_link"></div>

The following features are added to create the EDB OCL Connector `13.1.4.2`:

-   EDB OCL now provides support for OTL 4.0 Certification. For more information, refer to [OTL Support](04_open_client_library/08_otl_support/#otl_support).
-   EDB OCL installation always uses latest libpq. For more information, refer to [libpq Cross-version Compatibility](03_libpq_compatibility/#libpq_compatibility).
